snippet: The Big East on Tuesday named Mike Aresco, a television executive, as the new conference commissioner.
abstract: Television executive Mike Aresco is named commissioner of the Big East conference.
lead_paragraph: The Big East on Tuesday named Mike Aresco, a television executive, as the new conference commissioner.

headline.seo: Big East Names TV Executive as New Commissioner
headline.main: Executive From CBS Will Lead Big East Conference
headline.print_headline: Executive From CBS Will Lead Big East
